name: Time Phaser
description:
Time Phaser is a 2D Plataformer Prototype where you can slowdown time with a Time Bubble!

Fight your way through an army of monsters and find the source of the problem in the heart of the city.

The Source files of this project can be found at: https://github.com/Nydergondh/TimePhaser

The Project was done in a month by: 

Vinicius Rosa: Programmer

Lucas Stimamilio de Barcellos: Game Designer, Artist

Disclamer: Remember that the game is just a prototype and can present some bugs, unpolished features.
